channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Technical Rescue ; INC#0899; 02:30PM; 11070 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3UJ1UXa" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3UJ1UXa</a>; #Sawtelle ; Firefighters were called to a working construction site where material was dropped below grade onto one worker and brushed against a second worker. Both workers were transported to an area hospital. The scene is now static.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC731 BC9 CM52 E19 E227 E237 E292 E37 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA59 RA827 RA92 SO1 T27 T37 T92 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Krishan Vadukul

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0899; 02:00PM; 1150 S Bonsall Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QKWolG" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QKWolG</a>; outside city; Firefighters, while below grade, found a second patient. Both patients were successfully extricated and transported to an area hospital in unknown conditions. The circumstances of the incident have yet to be confirmed. ; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC731 BC9 CM52 E19 E227 E237 E292 E37 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA59 RA827 RA92 SO1 T27 T37 T92 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Krishan Vadukul

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0899; 01:16PM; 1150 S Bonsall Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QKWolG" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QKWolG</a>; outside city; Firefighters found one patient below grade trapped with leg injuries. Firefighters are currently extricating the patient to street level. ; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC9 E19 E237 E292 E37 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA59 RA92 T37 T92 UR88; CH7; 12; Krishan Vadukul

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire ; INC#0610; 10:59AM; 6557 N Mclennan Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QMMrnR" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QMMrnR</a>; #LakeBalboa; It took 39 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames in this one-story single family home. Fire began in the kitchen, and all occupants escaped the house prior to fire department arrival; several cats were pulled to safety by firefighters and treated for smoke inhalation. No surrounding homes were affected, no occupant or firefighter injuries reported. The incident remains under investigation. ; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E100 E273 E290 E39 E83 E90 RA100 RA83 SO1 T73 T90; CH8; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#0610; 10:36AM; 6557 N Mclennan Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QMMrnR" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QMMrnR</a>; #LakeBalboa; First arriving companies report a one-story single family dwelling with heavy fire showing from the first story and attic. All human occupants are out of the house, though there are reports of pets still in the home. Companies are currently making entry with hose lines to extinguish the flames, proceeding to the roof to ventilate the smoke, and using hose lines outside to protect neighboring homes.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E100 E273 E290 E39 E83 E90 RA100 RA83 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

Update Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0827; 02:30PM; 5801 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi</a>; #MidWilshire; Eight (male and female) teenage students from an unidentified school, were on a field trip to the La Brea Tar Pits , when they were discovered acutely ill by an on-site Security Officer, who called 9-1-1. LAFD Paramedics arrived quickly to determine each had an altered level of consciousness, following their reported ingestion of cannabis edibles. In fair condition, all were taken by ambulance to area hospitals for further medical assessment. LAPD Incident #2397. ; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; AP65 BC18 E261 E61 EM11 RA26 RA29 RA3 RA34 RA35 RA46 RA71 RA76 RA92 RA97 T61; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0827; 12:45PM; 5801 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi</a>; #MidWilshire; PRELIM: As many as eight young persons (teens? unknown personal or site affiliation) with altered level of consciousness after apparent contact with or ingestion of a yet to be identified product or substance. Per protocol, all will be taken by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in undetermined condition. No further details.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; AP65 BC18 E261 E61 EM11 RA26 RA29 RA34 RA35 RA76 RA92 T61; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0590; 10:45AM; 320 S Soto St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bAVi3Q" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bAVi3Q</a>; #BoyleHeights; *Address Corrected* 35 LAFD Firefighters took just 13 minutes in defensive firefighting operations, to extinguish an abandoned and unoccupied 1,450 square foot one-story former restaurant - the site of a previous fire, that was fully involved on their arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E2 E202 E209 E25 E4 RA2 RA25 SO1 SQ21 T2 T9; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0590; 10:32AM; 2334 E 4th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4akm4fM" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4akm4fM</a>; #BoyleHeights; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Defensive firefight at a fully involved, abandoned and apparently vacant detached one-story commercial building (former restaurant), the site of a previous fire.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E2 E202 E25 E4 RA2 RA25 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Cliff Rescue; INC#0792; 12:38PM; 753 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wnC1nQ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wnC1nQ</a>; #SanPedro; Firefighters responded to reports of a person at the bottom of the cliffs near Point Fermin. LAFD arrived by air, land, and sea to find someone deceased at the bottom. Crews will provide assistance to law enforcement and the Medical Examiner in recovering the body. No additional patients. No details regarding the circumstances surrounding the death. The scene is under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E238 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA101 RH114 T38 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
